description: Our cool new luxury comforts 2 bedrooms apt, with 2 beds one King Size, other Queens, 10 minutes from Barclay stadium, 3 blocks from the Subway 15 minutes rid to NYC, Curved Smart TV 4K, free wifi, parking, gym , coffee , tea, soft drinks, desktop, printer, scanner,free washer and dryer.
name: 2BD New Luxury Apt. 15 Min to NYC
review: Jimmy is an exellent host. He kept me in touch every day I wrote him. The ap is great. Modern, clean, cozy and  so comfortable! My high recommendation
